name: The Chaos Rift
description:
Now that you have opened another rift to an unsuspecting world, all that stands between you and consuming it is a handful of wizards. Take them out and grow the mighty chaos empire.

This game was made for the 6th Bracky's game jam.

Unfortunatly there was no time to add sound. Play this game on a stormy night for the perfect atmosphere.

Your feedback is very welcome.
